channel.title: ClairtyX, Development Team
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/ne89k.gif[/img]
[b]Introduction:[/b]
Welcome to ClairtyX's development thread. ClairtyX will be a server based on economy. It will be run on an extremely powerful Virtual Private Server for great game play. We already have a domain and we are running off Vbulletin software.
[img]http://i40.tinypic.com/70xs2a.png[/img] Play Now
[img]http://i39.tinypic.com/zw0tis.png[/img] Forums
[img]http://i43.tinypic.com/191r8.gif[/img] Vote
[img]http://i44.tinypic.com/11t7rrn.png[/img] Donate
[img]http://i41.tinypic.com/23ut169.gif[/img] Highscore
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/35c53xe.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/30bz91v.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/etv6dx.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/x0qy6f.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1z1ef0y.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/ojf39h.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/o6zh8i.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1g9yv.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2cr14qo.png[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/oqm788.png[/img]
[b]Founders:[/b]
Saige - Founder Lust - Co-Founder
[b]Website Developers:[/b]
* - Head Developer * - Website Developer * - Website Developer
[b]Java Development Team:[/b]
Saige - Head Developer * - Head Developer * - Java Developer * - Java Developer
[b]Administrators:[/b]
Shaun - Head Administrator Rose - Administrator * - Administrator
[b]Global Moderators:[/b]
* - Head Moderator * - Moderator * - Moderator
[b]Forum Staff:[/b]
* - Forum Manager * - Forums _______________________________________________________
We have a VPS! (Ddos protected) Running on really good specs: 4GB RAM 3.10Ghz Processor (AMD Athlon II X2 225) Windows 7 OS Windows rating: 5.0/5.0!! -Website Vbulletin Powered -639 Skill Interface -Added Curses -Great Bridding / Switching System -Vote4Cash Command -Webclient Ready -Soulwars Cape -Torva, Pernix and Vitrus -Critical Hits -Fixed Slayer -Ring of Life Effects -Skillcape Emotes -602 Animations and 614 Items, 317 NPCS -New Rendering Methods for textures -Fun PK -Chaotic Item Sets -Dungeoneering Teleport GFX including use of Kinship Ring -Updated Maps -634 Items -Korasi Sword ___________________________________________________________
[b]Do you want to apply?[/b]
[code]Can you code Java: Position: Experience (Scale 1-10): Age: Time you will use a day on the server: Previous Work: Skype:[/code] _____________________________________________________________
[code]Can you write Html/Php: Do you have much website knowledge: Position: Experience (Scale 1-10): Age: Time you will use a day on the server: Previous Work: Skype:[/code]

item.title: ClairtyX, Development Team
item.dc:creator: @ClairtyX ClairtyX
item.description:
@ClairtyX wrote:

[quote=“owner5, post:3, topic:454342”][size=10pt]Can you write Html/Php:I can code HTML well and i know JavaScript well
Do you have much website knowledge:I’d say yes i go to a vocational highchool where i take 2 hours of Computer Science every day.
Position: Head Website developer, website dev, Administrator, Forums manager
Experience (Scale 1-10):9
Age:17
Time you will use a day on the server:3-4 hrs
Previous Work:CO-Owner of Deadlyscape. Admin/Website Creator of http://Sabatinoscape.tk/ (Server has shut down so i kept the home page only.
Skype:om4r321 [/size][/quote]

Accepted, waiting for you to accept the skype request.

Read full topic
